Pre-Game Insights: The Warriors have gone 10-9 in home games.
The Heat are 7-10 on the road.
The Warriors average 15.2 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.6 more made shots on average than the 13.6 per game the Heat give up.
The Heat average 14.0 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.7 more makes per game than the Warriors allow.
